review:
Dr Goyle is Highly professional and a very kind and courteous doctor. I highly recommend her.
 Had a sinus problem which was troubling me for quite some time now and she was able to quickly diagnose it and also gave me a very detailed information about all the do‚Äôs and don‚Äôt and lifestyle changes I need to follow. If you‚Äôre looking for a GP Dr.Goyle is definitely the right doc for you.

review: **** ******* She explained my reports really well to me in full detail and also took the time and was patient enough to understand my full medical history

I am very disappointed & I would like to bring to Practo notice, on 6th Mar'24 , I visited Dr.Madhulika Goyle - Verified  & booked by Practo for a basic health fitness certificate for learning swimming lessons. 

On my 1st visit on 6th Mar'24, like any other patient I just observed from my patient seat as I trusted the doctor that she has mentioned my correct name & has signed stamped. Then I just took the certificate envelope & left. Later when I finally got the time to enroll the classes & was approaching my swimming class * *** ********* **** ********* ******* *********** ****** ** ** ****** ****** ****  *** ********* ** **** ***** ****** * I too have other work & commitments then later I manage to pay a personal visit & sort this but her clinic was closed till 13th May'24 .So on 20th May'24, I searched through Practo & booked appointment and contacted her about the issue. After learning that it was her fault she told me to cancel Practo booking else Practo will charge as both (I am expecting that I am not been charged for cancellation by Practo) , she insisted & I cancelled my practo booking.

**** **** ****** ******* **** * ******* **** ******* ** ** ******** **** ****** *** **** **************** * ******** **** * ********* ****** ********* *** ***** **** *** ** ******** ** ***** ***** ******* * ******** ** ** **** **** *** ***** *** *** ******** ** *** ***** *** ********* ** **** **** ******* * **** ** *** *** ***** ***** **** * *** ******* *** ******* ** *** *********** ****** ****** * ****** **** * **** ** ****** ** ** *** * **** **** *** **** I have seen no doctor treating their patient this way. Still I requested to see as you were out of town for more than 15-20days, kindly you make my new certificate 15days ahead from my actual first visit date which was 6th Mar'24. *** ******* ********** **** ** *** * *** *********** **** * **** ** **** I just heard her & left her clinic with my old certificate.******* ** *** *** ** * ******* *** ***** ** ****** ************** * ******** * *** **** * ***** ****** *********** **** * ******* *** ***** ******** it was her fault that her absent minded cost me Rs.800 for 1st visit where she wrote a year back dated certificate & because of her I didn't enroll my classes (now it would have been more than 30 days of my swimming sessions) as I was not having time to visit her & get a revised certificate. 
Also, I always saw this clinic not operational, no patients, no receptionist even both the times I booked and she visited only that time* *** *** ****** *** * ******* ** **** * ****** ** ** ******** ***** ****** ***** ** **** ** ***** ** **** ****** **** ****** ****** ******* **** *** **** ** **** ***** **** ***********

I have booked appointment for my friend and we have visited the clinic. Doctor was good in terms like going check up well, but after the check up she had suggested for some normal medicines only. So I had taken appointment with different doctor. In clinic all this was good and it was hygienic only.

I have booked online video consultation with Dr. Madhulika Goyle. My appointment was on time, doctor had listen to all my concern and according to that she had suggested to the medicines. I am satisfied with her treatment and I would like to recommend this doctor for others also.
